page.title: 11WOOLMER ESTATE AT BORDON
page.content: The Woolmer Industrial Estate is situated on the western side of the A325 and is half way between Whitehill and Bordon. It is a total of 25 acres and each warehouse is used as a building factory and the warehouses can be rented. The markets for Woolmer Industrial Estate are: London, UK, Europe, Africa, Middle East, Hong Kong, Canada, USA and Australia. There are some local markets as well. There are 131 people working there at the moment. There are 60 warehouses and sections A to D. The local authority have provided cheap land for employment. The Woolmer Estate provides kitchen appliances such as: cookers, units, worktops. Food such as gateaux, meat and fish dishes. Carpet, motor care, a welding specialists and sealab contact.{
